TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DatabaseMetaData extends Java.Lang.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: Android.Runtime.Register("java/sql/DatabaseMetaData", DoNotGenerateAcw=true)
System.Obsolete("Use the 'Java.Sql.IDatabaseMetaData' type. This class will be removed in a future release.")

Docs.summary: An interface which provides comprehensive information about the database management system and its supported features.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: Android.Runtime.Register("importedKeyCascade")
System.Obsolete("Use 'Java.Sql.IDatabaseMetaData.ImportedKeyCascade'. This class will be removed in a future release.")

Docs.summary: For the column UPDATE_RULE, indicates that when the primary key is updated, the foreign key (imported key) is changed to agree with it.

System.Obsolete("Use 'Java.Sql.IDatabaseMetaData.ImportedKeyNoAction'. This class will be removed in a future release.")

Attribute.AttributeName: Android.Runtime.Register("importedKeyRestrict")
System.Obsolete("Use 'Java.Sql.IDatabaseMetaData.ImportedKeyRestrict'. This class will be removed in a future release.")

Docs.summary: For the column UPDATE_RULE, indicates that a primary key may not be updated if it has been imported by another table as a foreign key.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: Android.Runtime.Register("importedKeySetDefault")
System.Obsolete("Use 'Java.Sql.IDatabaseMetaData.ImportedKeySetDefault'. This class will be removed in a future release.")

Docs.summary: For the columns UPDATE_RULE and DELETE_RULE, indicates that if the primary key is updated or deleted, the foreign key (imported key) is set to the default value.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: Android.Runtime.Register("importedKeySetNull")
System.Obsolete("Use 'Java.Sql.IDatabaseMetaData.ImportedKeySetNull'. This class will be removed in a future release.")

Docs.summary: For the columns UPDATE_RULE and DELETE_RULE, indicates that when the primary key is updated or deleted, the foreign key (imported key) is changed to NULL.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
